titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Richard C. Carroll, Associate Secretary, Yale University, Records
Carroll (Richard C), Associate Secretary, Yale University, Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 08:04

did.unittitle: Richard C. Carroll, associate secretary, Yale University, records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of committee minutes, reports, letters, correspondence, and memoranda documenting the activities of Richard C. Carroll as associate secretary.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Yale University. Office of the Secretary

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 4-B (YRG 4-B), Records of Yale deputy, associate, and assistant secretaries.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Richard C. Carroll, Associate Secretary, Yale University, Records (RU 191). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged alphabetically by subject.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of committee minutes, reports, letters, correspondence, and memoranda documenting the activities of Richard C. Carroll as associate secretary.

controlaccess.subject: Universities and colleges -- Administration
controlaccess.corpname: Yale University. Office of the Secretary
